attributes.action: Object to Plymouth City Council quickly (very) knocking down historic buildings, especially in and around the Devonport area. Then complaining ad nauseum when English Heritage registers the Council Offices as a listed building.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The City Council raise no objections to contractors knocking down Georgian and later historic buildings in the Mount Wise, Devonport and Stonehouse area. Not to mention the thousands of George 2nd cobbles they let be dug up and disappear. But they are complaining bitterly about not being able to have new plush offices. Serves them right.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
